articles.title: OU Announces Cost-Cutting Measures Due to COVID-19 - University of Oklahoma - Soonersports.com
articles.description: With the start of the 2020-2021 fiscal year, the University of Oklahoma Athletics Department announced Wednesday initial cost-cutting measures that are now in place as a result of the COVID-19 global pandemic.

articles.title: Gov. Lee exploring local mask mandate options as COVID-19 cases, hospitalizations rise to new highs - WBIR.com
articles.description: The governor stopped short of saying if he would consider mandating masks in public statewide, but said he is checking into giving local leaders the authority.
